column5: This is a 3 bedroom / 3 bathroom beautiful waterfront townhome. Located on a wide canal, great location for all water sports and you can fish right off the deck. The home is totally furnished with everything you will need for a perfect vacation. Every bedroom has a flat screen television, and one more in the living room. We are close to everything on the Island. The beach, Schlitterbahn, great fishing, bird watching, golf, the National Seashore all are only minutes away!
column8: Gun Cay 402/Fish from the Deck! Close to the Beach
